params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.max_nodes
params.description: The maximum number of nodes that the group should have. Must be set if autoscaling is enabled. Maximum value allowed is 100.

params.name: data.min_nodes
params.description: The minimum number of nodes that the group should have.

params.name: data.mode
params.description: The autoscaling mode. Set to one of: ON, OFF, or ONLY_SCALE_OUT. For more information, see Autoscaler modes. Check the Mode enum for the list of possible values.
